title: (x) "The Letterbook of Eliza Lucas Pinckney" calligraphic font - Marigold {Akira, Yves}
content:
Can someone steer me in the right direction to name this font? I think I should know it but my searches have hit dead ends. Help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080518143435im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/eliza_6718.gif)

 [‹ (x) "Simply beautiful" script - Zapfino {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080518143435/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36137 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Canon corporate typeface - Denda New {George Nisioiu} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080518143435/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14527 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze
